items.name: Braised Stuffed Bean Curd
items.description: Soft tofu stuffed with minced meat, braised in savory golden sauce.

th.name: เต้าหู้ยัดไส้ตุ๋นซอสทอง
th.description: เต้าหู้เนื้อนุ่มยัดไส้หมูสับ ตุ๋นในซอสทองรสเข้มข้น

vi.name: Đậu hũ nhồi thịt kho vàng
vi.description: Đậu hũ mềm nhồi thịt băm, om trong nước sốt vàng thơm đậm đà.

zh.name: 高州黄金卜
zh.description: 豆腐夹肉，慢炖至金黄入味，香浓可口。

items.name: Braised Fried Pork Belly with Yam
items.description: Crispy fried pork belly layered with yam and braised till tender.

th.name: หมูสามชั้นตุ๋นเผือก
th.description: หมูสามชั้นทอดกรอบแล้วตุ๋นกับเผือก หอมหวานกลมกล่อม

vi.name: Thịt ba chỉ kho khoai môn
vi.description: Thịt ba chỉ chiên giòn kho cùng khoai môn mềm thơm vị quê nhà.

zh.name: 家乡扣肉
zh.description: 炸五花肉配芋头同炖，软糯香浓。

items.name: Homemade Salted Chicken
items.description: Traditional salted chicken steamed to juicy perfection.

th.name: ไก่เค็มโฮมเมด
th.description: ไก่หมักเกลือสูตรบ้านๆ นึ่งให้เนื้อนุ่มชุ่มฉ่ำ

vi.name: Gà muối quê nhà
vi.description: Gà muối đậm vị, hấp chín giữ nguyên hương thơm tự nhiên.

zh.name: 家乡咸鸡
zh.description: 家传咸鸡，肉质鲜嫩，咸香可口。

items.name: Braised Stuffed Bitter Gourd
items.description: Bitter gourd stuffed with minced meat, braised until soft and flavorful.

th.name: มะระยัดไส้ตุ๋น
th.description: มะระยัดไส้หมูสับตุ๋นในซอสรสเข้ม

vi.name: Khổ qua nhồi thịt kho
vi.description: Khổ qua nhồi thịt băm, om mềm trong nước tương đậm đà.

zh.name: 高州酿苦瓜
zh.description: 苦瓜酿肉，入口回甘，汤汁鲜香。
